column4: hi all. I'm updating from 7.10 to 8.04 right now. Is it normal that last message for a 30 minutes is "ldconfig deferred processing now taking place"?
give it some more time, nd also see if it is actually working (and hdd, cpu activity)
ok. the hdd led is still blinking. but 30 minutes without any new line on core duo cpu making me think that somthing  going wrong
it may be normal, if you have many installed packages
